wikipedia_page.main: Lee Robinson (born 30 December 1980) is a former professional rugby union footballer who played on the wing for Plymouth Albion, Bristol Rugby, Leicester, L'Aquila and London Wasps.

response: Lee Robinson is the name of:
*Lee Robinson (footballer) (born 1986), English goalkeeper for Dunfermline Athletic
*Lee Robinson (politician) (1943–2015), American politician, former Mayor of Macon, Georgia
